name: ABC
text: REPORTER'S NOTEBOOK: What it's like to be in Milwaukee this week for the DNC. https://t.co/eZPxpzjQoG via @benyc

name: ABC
text:
High school football is returning to Alabama in a test of COVID-19 precautions.

Tape will cover seats at some stadiums to keep fans spread apart; concessions options will be limited in places; and bands and cheerleaders may not travel to away games. https://t.co/T4K7mtkBZz https://t.co/7CceeN6isy

name: ABC
text: In the span of Pres. Trump's term in office, the far-right fringe culture known as QAnon has made its way from cryptic posts on 4chan message boards to the White House press briefing room. https://t.co/ifXKQCQmbU

name: ABC
text: ALL OF THE LIGHTS: Waves breaking on Monterey Bay offer up a dazzling display, lighting up the night due to bioluminescent plankton. https://t.co/cfBzoKIB49 https://t.co/gOQ1HMZ6qS

name: ABC
text: Years of turmoil at USPS governing board fueled political firestorm, critics say. https://t.co/m0mZoHmdzV

name: ABC
text: .@ABC News SPECIAL REPORT: Joe Biden will accept the Democratic nomination for president on the final night of the 2020 Democratic National Convention. https://t.co/bAzpruS2Cc

name: ABC
text: Andrew Yang: “Our future is now and it is daunting. But I ask you tonight to join me to help Joe and Kamala fight for the promise of America, turn the page for our country and lead us forward to a future we’d actually be proud to leave for our children.” https://t.co/6DLWHOY082 https://t.co/1gUUTgIYGz

name: ABC
text: Julia Louis-Dreyfus jokes that a fifth night has been added to the Democratic National Convention schedule "where we will just play Michelle Obama's speech on a loop." https://t.co/3FQXzkPOB7 #DemConvention https://t.co/CVt614rqaQ

name: ABC
text: "With liberty and justice for all." https://t.co/6DLWHOY082 #DemConvention https://t.co/xlEOYYjXyP

name: ABC
text: "With liberty and justice for all." https://t.co/6DLWHOY082 #DemConvention https://t.co/s8Mys1fIZU

name: ABC
text: RT @ABCPolitics: “Joe Biden not only knows how to read, but also, he reads everything,” Julia Louis-Dreyfus says while recounting a story about Biden calling to congratulate her for appearing on the cover of Amtrak’s Onboard Magazine. https://t.co/1owZh91S94 #DemConvention https://t.co/CVBRiGRODT

name: ABC
text: Atlanta Mayor Keisha Lance Bottoms: "The baton has now been passed to each of us...We have gathered in our streets to demand change. And now we must pass on the gift John Lewis sacrificed to give us. We must register, and we must vote." https://t.co/6DLWHOY082 #DemConvention https://t.co/KKm9tXkSbv

name: ABC
text: Atlanta Mayor Keisha Lance Bottoms pays tribute to the late Rep. John Lewis: “He walked gently amongst us — not as a distant icon but as a God-fearing man, who did what he could to fulfill the as yet unfulfilled promise of America.” https://t.co/6DLWHOY082 #DemConvention https://t.co/upJZlMh2O5

name: ABC
text: Atlanta Mayor Keisha Lance Bottoms: "There are those who are disgracefully using this pandemic to spread misinformation and interfere with voting—forcing many, in 2020, to still risk their lives to exercise their sacred right to vote." https://t.co/6DLWHOY082 #DemConventions https://t.co/Aa8RLlR9zO

name: ABC
text: Atlanta Mayor Keisha Lance Bottoms: "There are those who are disgracefully using this pandemic to spread misinformation and interfere with voting—forcing many, in 2020, to still risk their lives to exercise their sacred right to vote." https://t.co/6DLWHOY082 #DemConvention https://t.co/uimDrlkkt2

name: ABC
text:
RT @GMA: .@JohnLegend and @Common perform "Glory" from the film "Selma" in honor of the late Rep. John Lewis. 

#DemConvention
https://t.co/b6kAOnpdy0 https://t.co/hhI9b5835m

name: ABC
text: Cedric Richmond, Jr., son of Rep. Cedric Richmond, recites the Pledge of Allegiance to kick off the last night of the #DemConvention. https://t.co/TNT4qGd4m1 https://t.co/xEGDvWwp9g

name: ABC
text: Comedian Sarah Cooper: "Whether you plan to vote by mail or in person wearing your mask, it is your vote and it's your right. Don't let Donald Trump take that away from you." https://t.co/6DLWHOY082 #DemConvention https://t.co/jphzDaUc7t

name: ABC
text:
California and Michigan secretary of states call voting "the oxygen of our democracy," and say Pres. Trump "is attacking vote-by-mail to distract and confuse voters."

"Donald Trump, his family, his staff—they all vote by mail." https://t.co/6DLWHOY082 #DemConvention https://t.co/kWbVUAHbiK

name: ABC
text: Sen. Cory Booker at the #DemConvention: "This dream ain't free. You got to work for it...let's now work together and stand together and, America, together we will rise." https://t.co/6DLWHOY082 https://t.co/Am1KvhJuga

name: ABC
text:
Former U.S. Surgeon General Vivek Murthy: “Our job is to speak the truth about public health, even when it’s controversial or perceived as political."

"Our nation absolutely has what it takes to overcome [COVID-19] … what we’re missing is leadership.” https://t.co/6DLWHOY082 https://t.co/jH9Cl9yxn8

name: ABC
text: Edward Good, a 95-year-old WWII and Korea War veteran, is a lifelong Republican who voted for Donald Trump in 2016, but he is now backing Joe Biden: “I think Trump has been the worst president we’ve ever had, so I’ll be glad to see him go.” https://t.co/6DLWHOY082 #DemConvention https://t.co/bUZEOekQNb

name: ABC
text: Sen. Tammy Duckworth says U.S. service members have a "coward-in-chief, who won't stand up to Vladimir Putin, read his daily intelligence briefings, or even publicly admonish adversaries for reportedly putting bounties on our troops' heads." https://t.co/6DLWHOY082 https://t.co/p21d15j0Sh

name: ABC
text: Sen. Tammy Duckworth: "Donald Trump doesn’t deserve to call himself commander-in-chief for another four minutes—let alone another four years." https://t.co/6DLWHOY082 #DemConvention https://t.co/X820hsqXtn

name: ABC
text: Pete Buttigieg: "The very ring on my finger...reflects how this country can change. Love makes my marriage real, but political courage made it possible." https://t.co/6DLWHOY082 #DemConvention https://t.co/gy5CQVkGls

name: ABC
text: Comedian Sarah Cooper: "Whether you plan to vote by mail or in person wearing your mask, it is your vote and it's your right. Don't let Donald Trump take that away from you." https://t.co/N4maU7RhUE #DemConvention https://t.co/CEthcnwqpX

name: ABC
text: Michael Bloomberg: "I'm not asking you to vote against Donald Trump because he's a bad guy. I'm urging you to vote against him because he's done a bad job." https://t.co/6DLWHOY082 #DemConvention https://t.co/Iamv7xqDLJ

name: ABC
text: Michael Bloomberg: "Trump says we should vote for him because he's a great businessman. Really?!" https://t.co/6DLWHOY082 #DemConvention https://t.co/cdd0v9UJq4

name: ABC
text: RT @ABCNewsLive: "His single biggest weakness as a manager is the way he selects the people closest to him, it's a blind spot," @ChrisChristie says, when asked about how the president deals with some of his associates who have faced federal charges. https://t.co/0YNBn32Bt4 https://t.co/uDYYQtieou

name: ABC
text: WATCH LIVE: Joe Biden's family speaks before he delivers remarks and formally accepts the Democratic Party's nomination for president on the final night of the Democratic National Convention. https://t.co/bAzpruS2Cc

name: ABC
text: Michael Bloomberg: "Donald Trump's economic plan was to give a huge tax cut to guys like me who didn't need i t, and then lie about it to everyone else." https://t.co/6DLWHOY082 #DemConvention https://t.co/DVE3SG5E3O

name: ABC
text:
Steph Curry, Ayesha Curry and their two daughters have a candid conversation at the #DemConvention. 

"Do you know what the president's job is?"

"To keep the environment safe." https://t.co/6DLWHOY082 https://t.co/cW6ymbQ8ty

name: ABC
text:
"He'll listen, he'll be there when you need him."

Hunter and Ashley Biden deliver heartfelt remarks about their father, Joe Biden, before he speaks on the final night of the #DemConvention. https://t.co/6DLWHOY082 https://t.co/n5rqVuHO45

name: ABC
text: HAPPENING NOW: Joe Biden delivers remarks and formally accepts the Democratic Party's nomination for president on the final night of the Democratic National Convention. https://t.co/bAzpruS2Cc

name: ABC
text: BREAKING: Joe Biden says he accepts, with humility, "this nomination for president of the United States of America." https://t.co/6DLWHOY082 #DemConvention https://t.co/ojUTL5ayoy

name: ABC
text: Joe Biden on Pres. Trump's pandemic response: "After all this time, the president still does not have a plan. Well I do." https://t.co/6DLWHOY082 #DemConvention https://t.co/aB2l5yO4D6

name: ABC
text: Joe Biden at the #DemConvention: "Our current president has failed in his most basic duty to the nation. He's failed to protect us. He's failed to protect America. And my fellow Americans, that is unforgivable." https://t.co/6DLWHOY082 https://t.co/CUKrTZuTl0

name: ABC
text: Joe Biden on Pres. Trump's pandemic response: "After all this time, the president still does not have a plan. Well I do." https://t.co/6DLWHOY082 #DemConvention https://t.co/jLO6aU6MDF

name: ABC
text:
RT @GMA: Joe Biden on running mate Kamala Harris: "Her story *is* the American story."

#DemConvention
https://t.co/b6kAOnpdy0 https://t.co/mu7YhCnQGD

name: ABC
text:
In outlining his COVID-19 plan, Joe Biden vows to take “the muzzle off our [health] experts,” so the public can get “unvarnished truth.”

“We’ll have a national mandate to wear a mask — not as a burden but as a patriotic duty to protect one another.” https://t.co/6DLWHOY082 https://t.co/AVgpXQWAX3

name: ABC
text:
Joe Biden says President Donald Trump has ”failed to protect America," and "that is unforgivable.”

“As president, I’ll make you a promise: I’ll protect America, I will defend us from every attack, seen and unseen, always, without exception, every time.” https://t.co/6DLWHOY082 https://t.co/1iL2buDdG5

name: ABC
text: Joe Biden on Kamala Harris: "She knows about all the obstacles thrown in the way of so many in our country—women, Black women, Black Americans, South Asian Americans, immigrants—the left-out and the left-behind." https://t.co/6DLWHOY082 https://t.co/ADPv4WIve7

name: ABC
text:
Joe Biden at the #DemConvention: "History has thrust one more urgent task on us: 

Will we be the generation that finally wipes out the stain of racism from our national character? I believe we're up to it. I believe we're ready." https://t.co/6DLWHOY082 https://t.co/oo5SYItYjv

name: ABC
text: Joe Biden: "Here and now I give you my word. If you entrust me with the presidency, I will draw on the best of us, not the worst." https://t.co/9JYJ1TiJVL #DemConvention https://t.co/129DslRKLm

name: ABC
text: Joe Biden: “Under President Biden, America will not turn a blind eye to Russian bounties on the heads of American soldiers. Nor will I put up with foreign interference in our most sacred democratic exercise -- voting.” https://t.co/6DLWHOY082 #DemConvention https://t.co/950WKLiwdh

name: ABC
text: The Bidens embrace following Joe Biden's acceptance speech for the 2020 Democratic nomination. https://t.co/6DLWHOY082 #DemConvention https://t.co/Jqq6R2PnbC

name: ABC
text: Joe Biden greeted by a screen of remote applause as he celebrates his nomination as the Democratic candidate for a president at a convention marked by social distancing amid the coronavirus pandemic. https://t.co/6DLWHOY082 #DemConvention https://t.co/Y8VaVNeeOZ

name: ABC
text: Joe Biden: “Let us begin you and I together, one nation under God. United in our love for America. United in our love for each other, for love is more powerful than hate, hope is more powerful than fear and light is more powerful than dark.” https://t.co/6DLWHOY082 #DemConvention https://t.co/aFx4EKk6qw

name: ABC
text: Fireworks greet Joe Biden and Kamala Harris following Biden's acceptance of the Democratic nomination for president. https://t.co/6DLWHOY082 #DemConvention https://t.co/u4fkF5Y7jw
